title: Cure - 1981 10 12 - Palais St. Sauveur, Lille, France.flac
description:

Mainset:

the holy hour
in your house
the drowning man
10.15 saturday night
accuracy
the funeral party
m
primary
all cats are grey
at night
three imaginary boys
fire in cairo
play for today
splintered in her head
a forest
faith 	

Encore 1:

grinding halt
killing an arab
forever
